name: Walking Simulator 2022 (Ast3risk)
description:
This game is a remake of my second Unity project, now extended beyond the point of sanity. It's like Crypt, if Crypt was made by a 10 year old.

It'll run on a piece of asparagus, so feel free to record your gameplay and email it to me or DM me if you finish (Asterisk#6578).
